def s(n):
   for i in range(n, 0, -1):
       if n%i == 0:

           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = s(n)
    print(t[d:], end="")
    print(t[:d][::-1], end="")


main()


n = int(input())
t = input()

s = [""] * n

# reverse the string
t = t[::-1

for i in reversed(range(1, n + 1)):
    if n % i == 0:
        # reverse the substring
        t = t[:i][::-1] + t[i:]

print(t)

def s(n):
   for i in range(n,0,-1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = s(n)
    print(t[d:], end='')
    print(t[:d][::-1], end='')

main()

import sys

file = open(sys.argv[1], "r")

for line in file:
    line = line.strip()
    if line == "":
        continue

    print(line)


def s(n):
   for i in range(n-1,0,-1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = t.replace(" ","")
    t = input()
    d = s(n)
    print(t[d:], end="")
    print(t[:d][::-1], end="")

main()


def s(n):
   for i in range(n,0,-1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = s(n)
    print(t[d:])
    print(t[:d][::-1])

main()
